        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object cfgFile)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if and only if the objects are the same; false otherwise

      • getIncludeValueInclDirectivePart

        public java.lang.String getIncludeValueInclDirectivePart()
        Return that part of the file's include value that is not the actual file name (incl. optional path). The result will comprise all special directives. Needed e.g. for renaming files and the property update from there.
        Returns:
        inclusion directive if defined, otherwise an empty string
